title: GH COVID-19 Tracker
description: GH COVID-19 Tracker is an easy to use, digital tool to help you assess and self report your symptoms for COVID-19. It should help to improve and accelerate the Government’s response to the challenges of the COVID-19 pandemic. You can use the Ghana Government COVID-19 Tracker to: -  Check coronavirus symptoms -  Latest guidance on COVID-19 Disclaimer: This app does not give health advice but it allows you to assess your symptoms and help control the spread of COVID-19. Please visit the Ghana Health Service website if you need health advice.
